channel.title: CVE Feed for PackageKit -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PackageKit -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-16122|2024-08-04T13:37:53.352Z -- packagekit -- packagekit
item.description: PackageKit's apt backend mistakenly treated all local debs as trusted. The apt security model is based on repository trust and not on the contents of individual files. On sites with configured PolicyKit rules this may allow users to install malicious packages.

item.title: CVE-2020-16121|2024-08-04T13:37:53.354Z -- packagekit -- packagekit
item.description: PackageKit provided detailed error messages to unprivileged callers that exposed information about file presence and mimetype of files that the user would be unable to determine on its own.
